medium: Collage of paper, ink, cloth, plastic; triptych
title: Installation:  Three Panels
description: three separately-framed panels--unglazed; abstract collage made of torn and cut white, pink, blue, yellow, green and grey cloth and white paper and plastic (?) with abstract ink drawings in black and red; each element is roughly rectangular in shape; a:  notch at LLC; b:  long vertical loose piece of grey fabric hanging down beyond bottom frame member; c:  all black and white with small blue elements at bottom and a few red elements at bottom
